name: The Tale of the Galactic Whale
name_original: The Tale of the Galactic Whale
description:
Arrow keys to move and turn.

Made in one week for the "Minimalistic Jam".

Sound Designer: https://soundcloud.com/tear-do...

Artist: https://ellieliota.carbonmade....

Note: Sometimes speed will not reset after dying. Sometimes the frame rate will become unstable. For either scenario please refresh and try again.
